Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements

Class Professor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPiece
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPieceWithOwner
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPieceWithOwnerMutable
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.Professor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Professor extends BoardPieceWithOwnerMutable
Class which models the five Professors of the game. Extends BoardPieceWithOwnerMutable to model change in player ownership.
